dict.acceptation: 开玩笑；戏弄；闹着玩；说着玩；

sent.orig: Texans may joke about a lot of things, but they don't joke about this.
sent.trans: 得克萨斯人在很多事情上开玩笑，但在这件事情上他们可从来不开玩笑的。

sent.orig: Psych, I joke, I joke, I kidd, I kidd.
sent.trans: 激动了，我开玩笑的，开玩笑。

sent.orig: Every joke can have its truth and now the joke's on you.
sent.trans: 每一个笑话都有它的真谛现在那个笑话就是你。

sent.orig: He loves a joke, a good joke.
As quicka joke as John is, apparently he didnt joke with his wife about cancer.
sent.trans: 显然，善开玩笑的约翰并没有把妻子的癌症当儿戏。
